articles.title: EU officials say it's too early to consider 4th COVID dose - Chattanooga Times Free Press
articles.description: European health officials say it's too early to consider giving a fourth dose of messenger RNA coronavirus vaccines to most people, but say an extra booster can be administered to those over age 80.

articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: Google joins Samsung in working with iFixit on a self-repair program - The Verge
articles.description: Google has partnered with DIY repair specialists iFixit to offer spare parts for its devices. Pixel smartphone parts like batteries, displays, and cameras, will be available to purchase in the US, Canada, Australia, the UK, and Europe.
articles.content:
